Title: PrismMVC for enterprise applications
Description: PrismMVC is a framework based on Microsoft PRISM for the development of WPF and Silverlight enterprise-class applications. PrismMVC implements MVC and MVVM patterns.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
PrismMVC is a framework based on Microsoft PRISM for the development of WPF and Silverlight enterprise-class applications. PrismMVC implements MVC and MVVM patterns.
